title: Sitting at the Used Bookstore Is?
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Hmhmhmm~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You seem to be in a good mood, Hanamaru.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! You see, Maru finally found a book that Maru has been looking for for so long at a used bookstore~. The library didn’t have it, so Maru had given up. This must be fate zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fate, huh? That sounds kind of cool....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? Did you say something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s nothing. Hey, can you take me to that used bookstore? Conveniently finding something you’ve given up on? That sounds like a trap to lure humans in. There’s probably a secret gate hidden in that place. And I, Yohane, shall reveal it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It was just luck that Maru found this book zura. Besides, you shouldn’t do anything that’ll cause trouble for the store, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m not going to! I just want to find magical tomes that are just sitting there, collecting dust, at the corner of the store!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....So you want to go look for some books? If that’s what it is, then Maru will take you there zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yaaay! Let’s go look for them together, Zuramaru!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
